title: An Algorithmic Framework for Approximating Maximin Share Allocation of Chores
description: Fair division of indivisible chores among $n$ agents with additive valuations.
results: Example 4.1: Example with 4 agents, 14 chores, and identical valuations showing that their algorithm cannot give better than 20/17-MMS even for identical valuations.
Section 6: 11/9-MMS in $O(m\log m + n)$ time for identical valuations.
